titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: STOP SMOKING LOST TO FOLLOW-UP TOTAL (PREGNANT WOMEN) - Description

div.p: STOP SMOKING LOST TO FOLLOW-UP TOTAL (PREGNANT WOMEN) is the number of pregnant women in a REPORTING PERIOD who have a Person Stop Smoking Episode and an OUTCOME AT 4 WEEK FOLLOW-UP FOR STOP SMOKING of National Code 'Non-smoking status not known/lost to follow-up'.
